description.english: Throw Tim to the sharks and try to escape from the ship by swimming
description.russian: Бросьте Тима акулам и попытайтесь сбежать с корабля вплавь
description.token: Throw Tim to the sharks and try to escape from the ship by swimming

description.english: Throw Le Clerk to the sharks and try to escape from the ship by swimming.
description.russian: Бросьте Ле Клерка акулам и попытайтесь сбежать с корабля вплавь.
description.token: Throw Le Clerk to the sharks and try to escape from the ship by swimming.

description.english: Finish off the doctor by wringing his neck.
description.russian: Прикончите доктора, свернув ему шею.
description.token: Finish off the doctor by wringing his neck.

description.english: Don’t share food with Tim on the ship, let him climb up the tree instead of you and then allow him to drink from a muddy river.
description.russian: Не делитесь едой с Тимом на корабле, дайте ему залезть вместо себя на дерево, а потом позвольте ему напиться из грязной реки.
description.token: Don’t share food with Tim on the ship, let him climb up the tree instead of you and then allow him to drink from a muddy river.

description.english: End the game with death from cannonball hitting your raft.
description.russian: Окончите игру смертью от попадания ядра в ваш плот.
description.token: End the game with death from cannonball hitting your raft.

description.english: Surrender to the captain and end the game with death from hanging.
description.russian: Сдайтесь капитану и окончите игру смертью от повешения.
description.token: Surrender to the captain and end the game with death from hanging.

description.english: Finish the game on a raft with a doctor
description.russian: Окончите игру смертью на плоту с доктором
description.token: Finish the game on a raft with a doctor

description.english: End the game with death from a giant anaconda attack.
description.russian: Окончите игру смертью от нападения гигантской анаконды.
description.token: End the game with death from a giant anaconda attack.

description.english: End the game with death from a crocodile attack.
description.russian: Окончите игру смертью от нападения крокодила.
description.token: End the game with death from a crocodile attack.

description.english: Find a blade in the jungles while examining pirate corpses.
description.russian: Найдите клинок в джунглях, осматривая трупы пиратов.
description.token: Find a blade in the jungles while examining pirate corpses.

description.english: While wandering in the jungle climb up a tree and look around.
description.russian: Во время блуждания по джунглям залезьте на дерево и осмотритесь.
description.token: While wandering in the jungle climb up a tree and look around.

description.english: End the game with death from a “palisade” trap.
description.russian: Окончите игру смертью от ловушки «частокол».
description.token: End the game with death from a “palisade” trap.

description.english: End the game with death from a spear, trying to attack local inhabitants.
description.russian: Окончите игру смертью от копья, пытаясь напасть на местных жителей.
description.token: End the game with death from a spear, trying to attack local inhabitants.

displayName.english: THIS IS MERELY THE BEGINNING OF THE PATH
displayName.token: THIS IS MERELY THE BEGINNING OF THE PATH

description.english: Finish the prologue.
description.russian: Окончите пролог.
description.token: Finish the prologue.

description.english: Jump down from a waterfall during a chase in the jungle.
description.russian: Прыгните с водопада во время погони в джунглях.
description.token: Jump down from a waterfall during a chase in the jungle.

description.english: Do not abandon Le Clerk in captivity and refuse to escape.
description.russian: Не бросить Ле Клерка в плену и отказаться от побега.
description.token: Do not abandon Le Clerk in captivity and refuse to escape.

description.english: End the game with death from decapitation, refusing to help Dubois.
description.russian: Окончите игру смертью от декапитации, отказавшись помогать Дюбуа
description.token: End the game with death from decapitation, refusing to help Dubois.

description.english: Give a kick to a little brat in the village.
description.russian: Дайте пинка мелкому засранцу в деревне.
description.token: Give a kick to a little brat in the village.

description.english: During the interrogation, lie about the captain, exaggerating his dangerousness.
description.russian: Соврите на допросе о капитане, преувеличив его опасность.
description.token: During the interrogation, lie about the captain, exaggerating his dangerousness.

description.english: Agree to help Dubois with the red fort.
description.russian: Согласитесь помочь Дюбуа с красным фортом.
description.token: Agree to help Dubois with the red fort.

description.english: Agree to take a sip out of the little brat’s mug without much arguing.
description.russian: Без лишних разговоров согласитесь отхлебнуть из кружки мелкого засранца.
description.token: Agree to take a sip out of the little brat’s mug without much arguing.

description.english: Behave like an idiot during the hike and call Monique with a whistle.
description.russian: Ведите себя как идиот во время похода и свистом окликните Моник.
description.token: Behave like an idiot during the hike and call Monique with a whistle.

description.english: Agree with Monique and leave Tim to die in the jungle.
description.russian: Согласитесь с Моник и оставьте Тима умирать в джунглях.
description.token: Agree with Monique and leave Tim to die in the jungle.

description.english: Convince Monique to send Tim for treatment in the settlement.
description.russian: Уговорите Моник отправить Тима на излечение в поселение.
description.token: Convince Monique to send Tim for treatment in the settlement.

description.english: Die in a fight with a giant gorilla, fighting alongside Monique’s squad.
description.russian: Погибните, сражаясь с огромной гориллой вместе с отрядом Моник.
description.token: Die in a fight with a giant gorilla, fighting alongside Monique’s squad.

description.english: Die, being devoured by a swarm of rats in underground caves.
description.russian: Погибните, будучи сожранным полчищем крыс в подземных пещерах.
description.token: Die, being devoured by a swarm of rats in underground caves.

description.english: Die under a cave-in in underground caves.
description.russian: Погибните под обвалом в подземных пещерах.
description.token: Die under a cave-in in underground caves.

displayName.english: LIGHT AT THE END OF THE TUNNEL
displayName.token: LIGHT AT THE END OF THE TUNNEL

description.english: Pass the labyrinth of underground caves.
description.russian: Пройдите лабиринт подземных пещер.
description.token: Pass the labyrinth of underground caves.

description.english: Die by the hand of the horner infiltrator.
description.russian: Погибните от рук лазутчика рогачей.
description.token: Die by the hand of the horner infiltrator.

description.english: Catch the horner infiltrator.
description.russian: Изловите лазутчика рогачей.
description.token: Catch the horner infiltrator.

description.english: Make love with Monique by the lake.
description.russian: Займитесь любовью с Моник в озере.
description.token: Make love with Monique by the lake.

description.english: Choose the infertile girl to give to the cultists as payment.
description.russian: Выберите бесплодную девушку для передачи культистам в качестве платы.
description.token: Choose the infertile girl to give to the cultists as payment.

description.english: Choose the healer to give to the cultists as payment.
description.russian: Выберите лекаря для передачи культистам в качестве платы.
description.token: Choose the healer to give to the cultists as payment.

description.english: Give any sacrifice to the cultists, breaking their neck beforehand.
description.russian: Передайте любую жертву культистам, предварительно сломав ей шею.
description.token: Give any sacrifice to the cultists, breaking their neck beforehand.

description.english: Give any sacrifice to the cultists alive.
description.russian: Передайте любую жертву культистам живой.
description.token: Give any sacrifice to the cultists alive.

description.english: Convince the captain to allow Rob to participate in the fort defence council.
description.russian: Убедите капитана позволить Робу участвовать в совете обороны форта.
description.token: Convince the captain to allow Rob to participate in the fort defence council.

description.english: Refuse to participate in bathing at the Kumran's celebration.
description.russian: Откажитесь от участия в купаниях на празднике Кумрана.
description.token: Refuse to participate in bathing at the Kumran's celebration.

description.english: Fully enjoy the bathing at the Kumran's celebration.
description.russian: Сполна насладитесь купаниями на празднике в Кумране.
description.token: Fully enjoy the bathing at the Kumran's celebration.

description.english: Replace the captain and string him up.
description.russian: Сместите и вздерните капитана.
description.token: Replace the captain and string him up.

description.english: Replace the captain and put him in stocks.
description.russian: Сместите капитана, но оставьте его живым.
description.token: Replace the captain and put him in stocks.
